author: Staff Reporter
text:
The legal tussle between filmmaker Priyadarshan and his wife actor Lissy came to a close with the Madras High Court facilitating a compromise between them.

Both the director and the actress were facing criminal and civil litigations moved against each other. Justice K.K. Sasidharan, directed them to appear before him and discuss the terms of settlement. Ms. Lissy agreed to withdraw the divorce case and the domestic violence complaint. Mr. Priyadarshan agreed for divorce by mutual consent ownership of properties in India and other countries and they were amicably settled.
title: Priyadarshan, Lissy end issues amicably
